description: This contract is to assist the CanmetMATERIALS Research Centre in investigating the hydrogen uptake into pipeline steel and casing steel.
duration_in_months: What is the Estimated duration of this contract in months? (if not 0)
full_summary:
## Hydrogen Service Contract
### Contract Notice

#### Document Reference
Procurement Reference Number: PW-23-01023038
Solicitation Number: 5000072187

#### Contract Overview
The Natural Resources Canada’s CanmetMATERIALS (CMAT) Research Centre invites contractors to submit a proposal for hydrogen service contract. The Centre requires contractors to investigate the hydrogen uptake into API X65 pipeline steel and P110 casing steel under near-pure hydrogen transportation and storage conditions. The Centre is looking for external support to:

* Investigate the effect of surface conditions of X65 pipeline steel and P110 casing steel on hydrogen uptake under high pressure conditions and validate laboratory results.
* Understand the role of operating parameters in hydrogen uptake with or without consideration of steel surface conditions.
* Identify practical solutions to reduce hydrogen uptake.

#### Tender Details

* The contract is expected to run for an estimated period of 3 years from the date of contract award to February 28, 2026.
* Tender closing date was February 20, 2023 at 13:00:00 hours.
* Respondents can download the RFP documents from [here.](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/f414d90ce30a66a8dff7fd8cb6c9e135/rfp_5000072187.pdf) (English) or [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/25/4ade377fd1963805402d9c5d78ee1f76/ddp_5000072187.pdf) (French).
* Contractors can also email Shazeen Dhanani, the Contract Specialist at [shazeen.dhanani@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca](mailto:shazeen.dhanani@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca) for inquiries.

#### Contract Category
The procurement is classified under **SRV** and the technical subject matter is **Professional Services / Program Advisory Services**.

#### Location
The contract will be delivered in **Ontario (except NCR)**.

#### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: February 20, 2023 at 13:00:00 hours.
* Contract award date: TBD. 

Make sure to only include relevent information and refrain from rambling. Also, ensure to present your answer in the requested markdown format. You have a 400-word limit.  Good
